title: NO REPRESENTATION IN RIOT CONGRESS, ALL WE ASK IS 1 RP

embed.description: Thighs of Gold / Silver 5 72LP / 28W 19L Win Ratio 60% / Azir - 12W 9L Win Ratio 57%, Zyra - 4W 1L Win Ratio 80%, Zac - 2W 1L Win Ratio 67%, Sona - 0W 1L Win Ratio 0%, Vi - 0W 1L Win Ratio 0%

body:
Dear beloved Riot, 

Your beautiful game is perfect for the Shuriman working class, so thank you. But as you know gold is tight, with national treasures being stolen from our kingdom everyday by Noxus bandits. We need an emperor that is strong, fearless, and with 300 k plus mastery - a Waring Kingdoms emperor. Please, all we ask is 1 RP from the Riot federal government to sent to our representative Thighs of Gold. 

Thank you,
a humble Shuriman citizen.

replies.body:
Oh dear, it sounds like the emperor is waring a lack of treasures.  Maybe if he did something about stopping the Noxus bandits, there would be a better abundance.  Emperor of the year.  https://static-cdn.jtvnw.net/emoticons/v1/25/1.0

No worries, Zilean is in need of some Shuriman sand to fill his hourglass.  You might find that he offered you a small profit on your account in exchange.  :)
You guys are awesome, thank you
